data.title: A Belt to A Pipes FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: A good FLASH/DRIVE to use early to prevent enemies from pushing aggressively toward A Belt.

data.title: A Main to A Site ZERO/POINT + FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT and FLASH/DRIVE combo to suppress and blind enemies on A Site.

data.title: B Garage to B Green ZERO/POINT
data.description: A good ZERO/POINT to suppress enemies playing around B Green.

data.title: A Nest to A Generator FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Generator from under A Nest to push opponents out of the corner or to kill them.

data.title: A Belt to A Site FLASH/DRIVE
data.description: This is a good FLASH/DRIVE for A Site from A Belt that blind enemies peeking allowing your team to push.

data.title: A Belt to A Site FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Site from A Belt to delay a defuse and secure the round.

data.title: Mid Blue to Mid Boiler ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT to suppress enemies playing in B Kitchen or Mid Boiler.

data.title: B Green to B Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for B Site post plant.

data.title: A Nest to A Site ZERO/POINT
data.description: This is a good ZERO/POINT for A Site.

data.title: A Nest to Top A Site FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for A Site.

data.title: A Nest to A Default FRAG/MENT
data.description: This is a good FRAG/MENT for the default plant spot on A Site.
